thread.title: ADORABLE! Mahesh Babu's Cute Family Pictures From Paris Vacation
thread.title_full: ADORABLE! Mahesh Babu's Cute Family Pictures From Paris Vacation

title: ADORABLE! Mahesh Babu's Cute Family Pictures From Paris Vacation
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Published: Sunday, October 25, 2015, 13:48 [IST] 
Superstar Mahesh Babu , who has been busy shooting for Srikanth Addala's Brahmotsavam , has taken out sometime from his busy schedules for his family.Mahesh Babu and Namrata along with their adorable kids Gautham and Sitara has gone for a quick vacation to Paris, to make best of their Dusshera holidays. 
Namrata Shirodkar, wife of Mahesh and former actress, has posted some pictures on her official Instagram account to the joy of Super fans. 
The star was spotted having some great time with kids while Gautham Krishna and Sitara appears to be having a gala time in Paris with their Superstar dad and super mom. 
Though Mahesh Babu was stuck between jam packed shooting schedules and brand endorsements, he always make sure that he gives his kids complete attention and time. 
Here is another such example to quote him as the best dad, check out the below slides for some cute pictures of the family from their recent vacation. ADORABLE! Mahesh Babu's Cute Family Pics From Paris Vacation 1/7 A photo posted by Namrata Shirodkar (@namratashirodkar) on Oct 22, 2015 at 8:16am PDT Mahesh 
Mahesh laughing it out with his adorable kids Gautham and Sitara. ADORABLE! Mahesh Babu's Cute Family Pics From Paris Vacation 2/7 A photo posted by Namrata Shirodkar (@namratashirodkar) on Oct 24, 2015 at 11:12am PDT Mahesh 
Mahesh Babu was captured having a nap on a bus while on his way to Paris. Now, isn't that a beautiful site? ADORABLE! Mahesh Babu's Cute Family Pics From Paris Vacation 3/7 A photo posted by Namrata Shirodkar (@namratashirodkar) on Oct 24, 2015 at 1:54pm PDT Family 
A collage of pictures from Mahesh Babu's family vacation. ADORABLE! Mahesh Babu's Cute Family Pics From Paris Vacation 4/7 A photo posted by Namrata Shirodkar (@namratashirodkar) on Oct 24, 2015 at 11:58am PDT Mahesh 
Mahesh Babu clicked with his kids Gautham and Sitara. ADORABLE! Mahesh Babu's Cute Family Pics From Paris Vacation 5/7 A photo posted by Namrata Shirodkar (@namratashirodkar) on Oct 23, 2015 at 4:37am PDT Namrata ADORABLE! Mahesh Babu's Cute Family Pics From Paris Vacation 6/7 A photo posted by Namrata Shirodkar (@namratashirodkar) on Oct 24, 2015 at 2:11pm PDT Namrata
